timeline.bodyText: Why is this a Handle instead of Handler?
timeline.author: MiguelPires

timeline.message:
feat(broker): support error end events

* validate and transform error end events
* throw an error event when the end event is activated
* create an incident if the error is not caught
* resolving the incident will create a new one
* extract logic to handle the error events
